title: About
text: Medical Officer | Public Health | Epidemiology | Statistical Analysis | Public Speaking | Speaker & Author

title: About
text:
Overview
Over 10 years of experience in the medical and health fields, currently a student in Doctor of Public Health (Epidemiology) program. Experienced in delivering talks and leading workshops on epidemiology, statistical analysis, and public health. Actively involved in consultations and simplifying complex health topics for broader audiences. Passionate about teaching, sharing knowledge, and making data-driven solutions accessible to all.

title: Dr Muhammad Saufi Abdullah
text:
I am passionate about public health, epidemiology, statistical analysis, and public speaking. I love simplifying complex topics and sharing knowledge through workshops, ebooks, and health-related talks. Whether it is teaching data skills or giving presentations on public health, I am always excited to help others understand the world of health and data analysis better.
Feel free to explore! Head to the About section to learn more about me, Services to see how I can help with consultations or collaborations, and Contact to reach out for any offers or partnerships.
